items.title: Awesome Jamstack
items.content_text:
### CMS

items.title: Awesome Homematic
items.content_text:
### Community Ressources (mostly german language)

*   [Homematic Forum](https://homematic-forum.de/forum/) - Diskussions-Foren

### Mobile Apps

*   [Home-24](http://www.home-24.net/index.php?page=sites/home.php\&app=home24) - üíµ Android
*   [HomeControl](http://www.ksquare.de/myhomecontrol/) - üíµ iOS
*   [TinyMatic](https://www.tinymatic.de/) - üíµ Android (ehemals: HomeDroid)
*   [Pocket Control](https://www.penzler.de) - üíµ iOS

### Alternative Sensors, Actuators and Hardware Modifications

*   [HAUS-BUS.DE](http://www.haus-bus.de/) - üíµ Homematic Wired kompatible Ger√§te.
*   [stall.biz](https://www.stall.biz/) - üíµ Alternative Antennen, Multi Sensor f√ºr das Wohnzimmer, Wetterstation, ...

### CCU Addons

*   [CCU Historian](https://ccu-historian.de/) - Langzeit Archiv und Graphen.
*   [Homeputer](https://www.contronics.de/shop/HomeMatic-System/Zentralen-und-Software.html) - üíµ

### Smart Home Software supporting Homematic

*   [Home Assistant](https://www.home-assistant.io/)
*   [IP-Symcon](https://www.symcon.de/) - üíµ
*   [Mediola](https://www.mediola.com/) - üíµ

items.title: Awesome Static Website Services
items.content_text:
### E-Commerce / Provided by the Host

*   [Moltin](https://moltin.com/) - Add eCommerce functionality to anything.

### Search / Provided by the Host

*   [CloudSh](https://cloudsh.com/) - Powerful search for your website with a few lines of JavaScript.
items.content_html:
E-Commerce / Provided by the Host

  • Moltin - Add eCommerce functionality to anything.

Search / Provided by the Host

  • CloudSh - Powerful search for your website with a few lines of JavaScript.

items.title: Awesome Ddd
items.content_text:
### Tools / Ruby

*   [Domain Storytelling](http://www.domainstorytelling.org/) - a knowledge-crunching technique that helps the people involved to familiarize themselves with the domain and work out a model that expresses their shared understanding. Available as a [print-out template](http://www.domainstorytelling.org/images/DST_Whiteboard-Kit.pdf), as well as open-source online tool, [WPS Modeler](https://www.wps.de/modeler) ([source (‚≠ê792)](https://github.com/wps/domain-story-modeler)).
items.content_html:
Tools / Ruby

  • Domain Storytelling - a knowledge-crunching technique that helps the people involved to familiarize themselves with the domain and work out a model that expresses their shared understanding. Available as a print-out template, as well as open-source online tool, WPS Modeler (source (‚≠ê792)).

items.title: Awesome Open Source Supporters
items.content_text:
### Continuous Integration

*   [Bitrise](https://www.bitrise.io/) - Hosted CI/CD for Android and iOS, free for Public Projects.
items.content_html:
Continuous Integration

  • Bitrise - Hosted CI/CD for Android and iOS, free for Public Projects.

items.title: Awesome Smart Tv
items.content_text:
### LG webOS / Third-party remote control libraries

*   [homebridge-webos-tv (‚≠ê683)](https://github.com/merdok/homebridge-webos-tv) - A plugin for [Homebridge (‚≠ê25k)](https://github.com/nfarina/homebridge) which allows you to control your webOS TV.
items.content_html:
LG webOS / Third-party remote control libraries

  • homebridge-webos-tv (‚≠ê683) - A plugin for Homebridge (‚≠ê25k) which allows you to control your webOS TV.

items.title: Awesome Dotnet Core
items.content_text:
### Frameworks, Libraries and Tools / API

*   [OpenAPI Generator (‚≠ê24k)](https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator) - OpenAPI Generator allows generation of API client libraries (e.g. C#, TypeScript, etc), server stubs (ASP.NET Core, NancyFx, etc), documentation and configuration automatically given an OpenAPI Spec (v2, v3).

### Frameworks, Libraries and Tools / Misc

*   [Bleak](https://github.com/Akaion/Bleak) - A Windows native DLL injection library.
*   [NFlags (‚≠ê50)](https://github.com/bartoszgolek/NFlags) - Simple library to made parsing CLI arguments easy. Library also allow to print usage help "out of box".
items.content_html:
Frameworks, Libraries and Tools / API

  • OpenAPI Generator (‚≠ê24k) - OpenAPI Generator allows generation of API client libraries (e.g. C#, TypeScript, etc), server stubs (ASP.NET Core, NancyFx, etc), documentation and configuration automatically given an OpenAPI Spec (v2, v3).

Frameworks, Libraries and Tools / Misc

  • Bleak - A Windows native DLL injection library.
  • NFlags (‚≠ê50) - Simple library to made parsing CLI arguments easy. Library also allow to print usage help "out of box".

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Geocoding

- API: [Geocod.io](https://www.geocod.io/)

  Description: Address geocoding / reverse geocoding in bulk

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown


- API: [Postcodes.io](https://postcodes.io)

  Description: Postcode lookup & Geolocation for the UK

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### Government

- API: [District of Columbia Open Data](http://opendata.dc.gov/pages/using-apis)

  Description: Contains D.C. government public datasets, including crime, GIS, financial data, and so on

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown


- API: [Open Government, Italy](https://www.dati.gov.it/)

  Description: Italy Government Open Data

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:
Geocoding

  • API: Geocod.io

    Description: Address geocoding / reverse geocoding in bulk

    Auth: apiKey

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown

  • API: Postcodes.io

    Description: Postcode lookup & Geolocation for the UK

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

Government

  • API: District of Columbia Open Data

    Description: Contains D.C. government public datasets, including crime, GIS, financial data, and so on

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown

  • API: Open Government, Italy

    Description: Italy Government Open Data

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown
